description.value:
Your blessed armament radiates power, further enhancing your chosen weapon. When you choose the weapon for your blessed armament during your daily preparations, add the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Astral] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Brilliant] property runes to the list of effects you can choose from. If you're holy, also add the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Holy] rune, and if you're unholy, also add the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Unholy] rune.

In addition, you can change the rune you've selected for the day to a different rune from your list as a 10-minute activity that has the concentrate, divine, and exploration traits. Changing the rune doesn't restore abilities that can be used only a limited number of times, such as Holy Healing for the holy rune

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Blessed Armament]{Effect: Blade Ally}
